price: Kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí ẹ gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Òun. Ó ń sọ ẹ̀dá di alààyè. Ó sì ń sọ ẹ̀dá di òkú. Olúwa yín àti Olúwa àwọn bàbá yín, àwọn ẹni àkọ́kọ́.
arabic: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥ'yī wayumītu rabbukum warabbu ābāikumu al-awalīna
